name: Hot Crossed Guns
description:
Use your arsenal of bread-guns to feed hoards of ravenous ducks. If you take damage, you can eat your own bread gun to restore health. This hybrid cooking-minigame, first-person shooter features 3 unique guns, 3 hectic waves of enemies, and a boss fight with BIG DUCK. I hope you enjoy playing, and please remember to rate this game on its Jam submission page!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

W A S D and Mouse to move and look around.

Left click is shoot.

Right click is use a held item.

Space Bar eats your current gun to restore 1 heart.

Keep kneading the dough to produce 3 different guns.

Unfortunately the volume sliders in settings don't work, sorry about that!

I'm looking forward to adding in a few features and fixes after the jam that I didn't have time to implement!

PS - You shouldn't feed ducks bread, it's bad for them! Try peas instead! :)

CornBoy's entry for the VimJam3 game jam.
